banner.message: Remember that the Cashback from your purchases will be deposited into your RockStar account before the 15th of each month.

transactions.disclaimer: Your purchases will be reflected within 24 to 48 business hours.

filters.descripcion: Select a period and establishment type to filter your cashback transactions

promotions.disclaimerExit: For your security, we will close your session on the site to redirect you to the RockStar Cashback promotions site.
